import { useState } from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { translationHelpers } from '../../../../helpers'; import { Card, CardBody, Row, Col, Button, Label } from "reactstrap" import { AvField, AvGroup, AvInput } from "availity-reactstrap-validation" const FormDetalles = (props) => { const [t, c] = translationHelpers('environmental_risk', 'common'); const [displayCovenantDetails, setDisplayCovenantDetails] = useState(true); function handleCovenantChange(event) { const value = event.target.value === 'Si'; console.log('covenant', value); setDisplayCovenantDetails(value); } return (

{ t("Other Details") }

{ displayCovenantDetails && ( <> )} ); }; FormDetalles.propTypes = { onSearch: PropTypes.func }; export default FormDetalles;
